import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import './verification.css' const Verification = ({userEmail}) => { const [resendButtonState, setResendButtonState] = useState(true); function resendVerification() { } return (

Verification email sent!

Please check your inbox and activate your account to get started. Email sent to:

{userEmail}

) } export default Verification
